data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the county of Kishoreganj. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kishoreganj, Dhaka, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Kishoreganj, Dhaka, Bangladesh honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Kishoreganj.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the county of Kishoreganj.
Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Jotdar people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, help the 3,648 believers in Kishoreganj to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Kishoreganj that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 798 neighbors who are far from you in Kishoreganj. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

location.name: Kishoreganj
location.people_groups_list: Jhalo Malo, Kaghazi, Jat Atra, Kaora, Karadar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Jhalo Malo (243,000), Kaghazi (2,200), Jat Atra (4,000), Kaora (5,100), Karadar (2,400)
